diff --git a/src/api/routes/users.ts b/src/api/routes/users.ts
index 1234567..abcdef0 100644
--- a/src/api/routes/users.ts
+++ b/src/api/routes/users.ts
@@ -15,8 +15,22 @@ export const userRoutes = createRouter();

 userRoutes.get('/:id', async (req, res) => {
   const { id } = req.params;
+  console.log('DEBUG: fetching user', id);
   const user = await UserService.findById(id);
-  res.json(user);
+  console.log('DEBUG: user result', JSON.stringify(user));
+
+  if (!user) {
+    console.log('DEBUG: user not found, returning 404');
+    return res.status(404).json({ error: 'User not found' });
+  }
+
+  console.log('DEBUG: returning user data');
+  res.json(user);
 });

+userRoutes.post('/', async (req, res) => {
+  console.log('DEBUG: creating user with body', req.body);
+  const user = await UserService.create(req.body);
+  debugger;
+  res.status(201).json(user);
+});
diff --git a/tests/api/users.test.ts b/tests/api/users.test.ts
index 2345678..bcdef01 100644
--- a/tests/api/users.test.ts
+++ b/tests/api/users.test.ts
@@ -20,6 +20,16 @@ describe('User Routes', () => {
     expect(response.body).toHaveProperty('id');
   });

+  it('should create a new user', async () => {
+    const response = await request(app)
+      .post('/users')
+      .send({ name: 'Test User', email: 'test@example.com' });
+    expect(response.status).toBe(201);
+    expect(response.body.name).toBe('Test User');
+  });
 });
